alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 2:56PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Rutland and south central Windsor Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 255 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clarendon, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rutland, Mount Holly, Ludlow, Shrewsbury, Rutland City, Mt. Holly, Rutland - Southern Vermont Airport, Plymouth, Mendon, Clarendon, Ira, Ludlow Village, Killington, Wallingford, West Rutland, Middletown Springs, Bridgewater, Poultney, Tinmouth and Plymouth Union. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Rutland; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
